Hi, I am having trouble installing Cantera in Matlab under Windows 
98.  For the first step of the installation process, I am supposed 
to "set environment variable CANTERA_ROOT to this directory."  
However, there isn't anywhere to set the environment variable under 
the control panels in Windows 98.  Does anybody know?  Thanks.
